眑字的基本解释

眑
yǎo
幽静。
视貌。

眑
āo
面目不平。

眑
ǎo
古同“窅”，凹眼睛。

眑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ǎo］
［《集韻》於絞切，上巧，影。］
(1)见“眑眇”。
(2)同“窅”。参见“眑目”。
[②]［yǎo］
［《廣韻》於糾切，上黝，影。］
［《集韻》伊鳥切，上筱，影。］
见“眑2眑”。

眑字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　眑； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页803第23
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?伊鳥切，音杳。【類篇】視貌。　又【韻會】深遠也。【前漢·禮樂志·安世房中歌】淸思眑眑。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於糾切，幽上聲。義同。　又【集韻】於絞切，音拗。深目也。與窅同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?於交切，拗平聲。與䫜同。面目不平也。見【趙叔向·肎綮錄】。

眑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
眑字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ǎo]
["Ji Yun" Yu Zhuangqi, Shang Qiao, shadow. ]
(1) See "眑眇".
(2) Same as "窅". See "眑目".
[②]［yǎo］
["Guangyun" Yu Jiaoqie, on the dark, shadow. ]
["Ji Yun" Yi Niao cut, Shang Xiao, shadow. ]
See "眑2眑".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Lunch】【Headword Department】　眑; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 803 23
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Yi Niao cut, the sound is 杳. 【Classes】Appearance.　[Rhyme Club] is also far-reaching. 【Former Han·Liyuezhi·An Shi Fangzhong Song】Chen Si Sui.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Yu Jiaoqie, quietly on sound. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Yu Jiaoqie, the sound is awkward. Deep eyes also. Same as the same.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? In cross-cutting, flat voice. Same as ling. The face is not flat. See [Zhao Shuxiang·Xin Ji Lu].
